snippet: Dr. Joshua D. Rosenberg of the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai writes that “it is good to hear” that the university’s health experts are getting a taste of their own medicine.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Joshua D. Rosenberg of the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai writes that “it is good to hear” that the university’s health experts are getting a taste of their own medicine.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
